title: E22 Vicious Vices and a "Shaved Off" Shotgun
description: It's Em's Lucky Number 22! And she got judged by a criminal. In this episode we also learn that Em and Christine have no morals - just give 'em a hundred dollars and they'll acquit you. Tune in to hear Em and Christine discuss the Trans Allegheny Lunatic Asylum and Robert Reldan. Get ready because it's a wild ride.
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
